archimate:Requirement.name: NF_TS_1
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a system administrator I need a test environment that is representative of the live environment in which I can see the replication of system faults and can test new configurations, models, techniques or any system change (e.g. emergency fix, software upgrade, patch, firmware upgrade) so that I can safely diagnose, develop and test the system without affecting the performance of the live operational forecasting system.
